entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
